ygData.subject: Re: VAMPIRIC EMBRACE
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/13/99 10:57:03 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... ANY melee (hand to hand, piercing, two handed blunt, or one handed blunt) attack is useful
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/13/99 10:57:03 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
mata_eq@... writes:

> it says this spell is a touch deliver spell so do I have to UNARMED attack?
> or can I melee w/ dagger and just cast it???
>
> If I need to unarmed attack to deliver this spell should I start fighting
> unarmed to get that skill up??? Can ANYONE tell me how this spell works,

ANY melee (hand to hand, piercing, two handed blunt, or one handed blunt)
attack is useful for that spell. It will RANDOMLY flare and do about 28
points of lifetap. (it will not go off every time you hit... just randomly)

> and why a Necromancer needs a HIGH DEX . . .
>
> does the high Dex help to hit in hand to hand combat???
>
It is RUMORED (no confirmation) to help with being interupted in spellcasting.

why specifically they made it a prime for Necros is unknown to me.
> thanks. . .
>

Sonoroud
